about_the_game:
On your way to grandma's house you meet a friendly wolf with much to say.
She suggest you pick some flowers on your way.
But before you could turn to say goodbye,
the friendly wolf had gone awry.

Late to arrive, nearly half-past five,
grandma in bed, bonnet on head.

Her face concealed,
terrible secret soon to be revealed.

Witty answer for every question,
most sinister grandma's expression.

With one last step closer,
grandma it is not, no sir!

Walking in reverse you trip,
wolf pounces licking upper lip.


Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
~5K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

content_descriptors.notes:
*All characters in this game are over the age of 21 years old.

- Furry
- Futanari
- Sexual assault
- Non-consensual sex
- Fear
- Dirty language
